summary: This is a forwarded email from November 13, 2021, alerting recipients that Ghislaine Maxwell has given her first interview from behind bars to a Daily Mail reporter. The email contains a link to the article in the Daily Mail Online.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is the subject of the forwarded email, having given her first interview from prison to the Daily Mail.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell's First Prison Interview
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell gives her first interview from behind bars to a Daily Mail reporter.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell gave her first interview from prison on or before November 13, 2021.
The interview was conducted by a reporter from the Daily Mail (Mail on Sunday).
The email forwards a link to the article published on the Daily Mail Online website.
